entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23.
